channel.title: Hugo on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on mattischrome

item.title: Into February
item.description: Having made it to one post per day in January, we now move into February: that graveyard of good habits for the new year. What is it about flipping over the calendar to a new month that does away with our resolve to continue with our resolutions? My office calendar has a lovely picture of a German steam train in the snow, in case you were wondering.

item.title: Some Git Instructions for Future Matt
